sentences.en: A little red hen once found a grain of wheat.
sentences.cn: 一次，一只红色的小母鸡找到了一粒小麦。

sentences.en: If the hen does not prate, she will not lay.
sentences.cn: 母鸡不唠叨不下蛋.

sentences.en: Litter in the hen coop beds down if it is not raked.
sentences.cn: 鸡笼里的稻草如不清除会形成硬层.

sentences.en: She does not like the hen that pecks all day.
sentences.cn: 她不喜欢这个整天啄来啄去的母鸡。

sentences.en: The boy has got a hen sparrow.
sentences.cn: 那男孩抓到一只雌雀.

sentences.en: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.cn: 小鸡聚集在母鸡翅膀下面。

sentences.en: The chickens gathered under the hen.
sentences.cn: 小鸡聚集在母鸡翅膀下面.

sentences.en: The hen ate the grains of corn on the ground.
sentences.cn: 母鸡啄食地上的谷粒.

sentences.en: The hen brought off a brood of young.
sentences.cn: 母鸡孵出了一窝小鸡.

sentences.en: The hen cackles when she has laid an egg.
sentences.cn: 母鸡下了蛋就咯咯地叫.

sentences.en: The hen gave a squawk when It'saw the cat.
sentences.cn: 母鸡见到猫时咯咯叫了起来.

sentences.en: The hen has hatched all her chickens out.
sentences.cn: 这只母鸡已经孵出了她的全部小鸡.

sentences.en: The hen is brooding her eggs.
sentences.cn: 母鸡正在孵小鸡.

sentences.en: The hen layed three beautiful speckled eggs.
sentences.cn: 母鸡下了3枚蛋壳上有小斑点的漂亮鸡蛋.

sentences.en: The hen may not be able to feed its young.
sentences.cn: 雌鸟可能无法给幼鸟喂食。

sentences.en: The hen moved the chicks along with pecks.
sentences.cn: 母鸡用喙啄着小鸡往前走. 匆匆的一吻

sentences.en: The hen sits in the hencoop [ henroost ].
sentences.cn: 母鸡 卧 窝.

sentences.en: The hen sits in the hencoop [henroost].
sentences.cn: 母鸡卧窝。

sentences.en: The higher officials knew there was a hen on.
sentences.cn: 高级官员们知道这里面有阴谋.

sentences.en: What Jones and her colleagues wanted to learn is whether a happy hen in fact produces a better product.
sentences.cn: 琼斯和她的同事们希望弄明白，是否一只幸福的母鸡确实产出更好的产品。

phrases.phrase: as rare (或 scarce) as hen's teeth
